trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Dá suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> classe fornecer a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> propriedade retorna uma coleção de esquemas para exibição de formatação de **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the top-level <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> templates.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> propriedade retorna uma coleção de grupos de modelo para os campos de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle e nível superior <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> modelos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade sempre retorna `true`, indicando que o designer cria uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: Os métodos de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> classe fornecer a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to a design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.DataBind%2A> método associa associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle a uma fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método retorna a marcação que é usada para renderizar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnClick%2A> method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnClick%2A> método é chamado quando uma região do modo de exibição de tempo de design de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> método é chamado quando o esquema da fonte de dados de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to remove or add properties or to shadow properties of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método é usado para remover ou adicionar propriedades ou a propriedades de sombra de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: Design-time editable regions are not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> methods have no functionality.
trans-unit.target: Editáveis do tempo de design não têm suporte no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle, portanto, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> métodos não têm nenhuma funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como estender o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência dos controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example derives the `MyGridView` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo deriva o `MyGridView` controlar do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: The `MyGridView` is simply a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: O `MyGridView` é simplesmente uma cópia de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: The example also derives the `MyGridViewDesigner` class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class and places a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> object for the `MyGridViewDesigner` on the `MyGridView` control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo também deriva o `MyGridViewDesigner` classe o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> classe e coloca um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> de objeto para o `MyGridViewDesigner` no `MyGridView` controle.

trans-unit.source: The `MyGridViewDesigner` overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to make the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> property visible in the **Properties** grid at design time.
trans-unit.target: O `MyGridViewDesigner` substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método para fazer o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> propriedade visível no **propriedades** grade em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyGridView` control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Ela substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para incluir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> propriedade, se for especificado, como uma nova linha primeiro no `MyGridView` controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the `MyGridView` control has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade o `MyGridView` controle tem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> valor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> desenha uma borda tracejada azul ao redor do controle para tornar sua extensão mais visíveis.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção da lista de ação de designer para esse designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of predefined formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de esquemas de formatação predefinidos a serem exibidos na caixa de diálogo **Autoformatação**.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> that contains the predefined schemes for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> que contém os esquemas predefinidos para a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> objeto é preenchido com um membro codificados em XML de uma classe interna.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> to bind to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> a associar à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.
trans-unit.target: Associa o controle associado à fonte de dados de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.DataBind%2A> method binds the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to the design-time data source and assigns a unique value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DesignerRegionAttributeName> field of each cell of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control's design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.DataBind%2A> método associa associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle à fonte de dados de tempo de design e atribui um valor exclusivo para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DesignerRegionAttributeName> campo de cada célula do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> processamento de tempo de design do controle.

trans-unit.source: The `dataBoundControl` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `dataBoundControl` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle associado este designer, ou uma cópia desse controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação usada para renderizar o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the markup used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém a marcação usada para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml> method does the following:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml> método faz o seguinte:

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property of the control to `true`, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> property is empty.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> propriedade do controle para `true`, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> propriedade está vazia.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property of the control to `null`, if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> propriedade do controle para `null`, se o esquema da fonte de dados não pode ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> object to force the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method to be called.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza o <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> objeto para forçar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método a ser chamado.

trans-unit.source: Calls the base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Chama o método base para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> property, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> is defined.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona uma nova linha primeiro à grade para conter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> propriedade, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> está definido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> class has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade do controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> classe tem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> valor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> desenha uma borda tracejada azul ao redor do controle para tornar sua extensão mais visível.

trans-unit.source: It does not change the run-time appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ele não altera a aparência de tempo de execução do controle.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> método, não deixe de chamar o método base, pois ela eventualmente, por meio de vários níveis de substituição, chama o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> controle ou uma cópia do controle para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> to which definitions of the selectable and clickable regions in the design-time view of the control are added.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection" /> ao qual as definições das regiões selecionáveis e clicáveis na exibição de tempo de design do controle são adicionadas.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design e preenche uma coleção de regiões de designer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the markup used to render the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém a marcação usada para renderizar o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%28System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection%29> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml> method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%28System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection%29> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml> método para gerar a marcação para o processamento de tempo de design do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%28System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection%29> also populates `regions` with a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%28System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection%29> também preenche `regions` com um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> objeto para cada região clicável ou selecionável do processamento de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, a primeira célula em cada linha é selecionável; todas as células nas linhas são clicáveis.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> class to change the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> classe para alterar a aparência do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> property, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> is defined.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona uma nova linha primeiro à grade para conter o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> propriedade, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Caption%2A> está definido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property of the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> class has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade do controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> classe tem o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> valor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> desenha uma borda tracejada azul ao redor do controle para tornar sua extensão mais visível.

trans-unit.source: It does not change the run-time appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Ele não altera a aparência de tempo de execução do controle.

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> method, be sure to call the base method or the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> overload, because they eventually, through several override levels, call on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Se você substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml(System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection)" /> método, certifique-se de chamar o método base ou o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml" /> sobrecarregar, porque eles eventualmente, por meio de vários níveis de substituição, chamam o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> controle ou uma cópia do controle para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> for which to fetch content.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> para o qual buscar o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the content for an editable region of the design-time view of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o conteúdo de uma região editável da exibição de tempo de design do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: This functionality is currently not available.
trans-unit.target: Essa funcionalidade não está disponível no momento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />, which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />, que implementa um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e projetar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.Initialize%2A> e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e os eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle associado este designer, ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs" /> that defines the clicked region of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs" /> que define a região clicada do controle.

trans-unit.source: Called when a region of the design-time view of the associated control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando uma região da exibição de tempo de design do controle associado é clicada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnClick%2A> method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnClick%2A> método salva o índice de região selecionada e atualiza a marcação que renderiza o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o esquema da fonte de dados do controle associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o designer estiver no modo de edição de modelo ou um campo está sendo adicionado ou editado, a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> método, que por sua vez chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> para atualizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle para refletir a alteração da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção implementando o <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades da exibição ou adicionar outras propriedades a ela na grade **Propriedades** ou para sombrear propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> property to `false` when the control is in template mode.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute> objeto do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Columns%2A> propriedade `false` quando o controle está no modo de modelo.

trans-unit.source: This is so a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the **Fields** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Isso é uma coluna que está no modo de modelo não pode ser excluído usando o **campos** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method in a class that is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> to change the **Properties** grid of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método em uma classe herdada do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner> para alterar o **propriedades** grade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The example makes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> property visible in the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo faz o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Page%2A> propriedade visível no **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para adicionar ou alterar atributos de propriedades na coleção de propriedades de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de chamar o método base antes de executar outro processamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número de linhas de amostra a serem exibidas pelo controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The number of sample rows.
trans-unit.target: O número de linhas de amostra.

trans-unit.source: If the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control allows paging and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property is greater than 0, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> plus 1 (but not greater than 100).
trans-unit.target: Se associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle permite que a paginação e a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> propriedade é maior que 0, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> propriedade retorna o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> mais 1 (mas não é maior que 100).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> does not allow paging or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> is 0, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> returns `5`.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> não permite que a paginação ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> é 0, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SampleRowCount%2A> retorna `5`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> to update.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion" /> a atualizar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> to write to <c>region</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> a ser gravado em <c>region</c>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies content for an editable region of the design-time view for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Especifica conteúdo de uma região editável da exibição de tempo de design do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.SetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> método não tem nenhuma funcionalidade; não há suporte para regiões editáveis na exibição de tempo de design a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma coleção de grupos de modelos para os campos do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> containing an element for each templated field in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection" /> que contém um elemento para cada campo modelo de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> property constructs a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control template (pager and empty data) in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> propriedade constrói uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> objetos, uma para cada campo de dados modelo e um para cada modelo de controle (pager e dados vazios) associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle.

trans-unit.source: The data field <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements have a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> object for each of the predefined row template types.
trans-unit.target: O campo de dados <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elementos têm um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition> objeto para cada um dos tipos de modelo de linha predefinida.

trans-unit.source: The control template <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elements contain a single <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de controle <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> elementos contêm uma única <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real associado ao designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real associada com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade é sempre `true`, o designer usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle que contém uma cópia do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controle não afeta qualquer persistência para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> itself to generate the design-time markup, and design-time changes to the control will persist to the page markup source.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> propriedade foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usará associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> para gerar a marcação de tempo de design e alterações em tempo de design para o controle será mantido para a origem de marcação da página.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> property to return <see langword="false" /> or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> propriedade para retornar <see langword="false" /> ou para determinar seu valor com base em se o controle está marcado com um nível de classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> is not overridden, the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> ignores the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: Se o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.GridViewDesigner.UsePreviewControl" /> não for substituído, o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> ignora o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.SupportsPreviewControlAttribute" />.
